info.name: FavQs APis
info.description:
# About this collection

This collection is built for testing the **FavQs Quotes API**, which allows searching, retrieving, and interacting with quotes.

#### ðŸ”‘ Key Features:

- **Authentication**:
    
    - API Key: `Authorization: Token token="YOUR_API_KEY"`
        
    - User login generates a `User-Token` (saved in collection variables).
        
- **Endpoints Covered**:
    
    - Get Quote of the Day
        
    - Search quotes by keyword, author, or tag
        
    - Manage favorites (`favorite = true/false`)
        
    - Create or manage quotes (where allowed)
        

#### ðŸ§ª Testing in Postman:

- Validate **status codes** (200, 401, etc.)
    
- Assert **response body is not empty**
    
- Schema validation for quotes
    
- Check arrays (`length > 0`)
    
- Save and reuse tokens in **collection variables**
    

#### ðŸš€ How to Use in Postman:

1. Set `base_url`, `api_key`, and `user_token` in **collection variables**.
    
2. Run individual requests or folders.
    
3. Use **Tests tab** for assertions like schema validation, response checks, and saving tokens.

exec: // Save it in a collection variable
console.log("Token saved in collection variable:", token);
// Save it in a collection variable
console.log("Token saved in collection variable:", token);

response.name: GetQuotes
response.body:
{
    "page": 1,
    "last_page": false,
    "quotes": [
        {
            "id": 36304,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "leadership"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/mwai-kibaki/36304-leadership-is-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 0,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Mwai Kibaki",
            "author_permalink": "mwai-kibaki",
            "body": "Leadership is a privilege to better the lives of others. It is not an opportunity to satisfy personal greed."
        },
        {
            "id": 384,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "perfection"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/anonymous/384-good-better-bes-",
            "favorites_count": 3,
            "upvotes_count": 0,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Anonymous",
            "author_permalink": "anonymous",
            "body": "Good, better, best; never let it rest till your good is better and your better is best."
        },
        {
            "id": 5936,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "beauty"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/paulo-coelho/5936-beauty-is-the--",
            "favorites_count": 3,
            "upvotes_count": 0,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Paulo Coelho",
            "author_permalink": "paulo-coelho",
            "body": "Beauty is the greatest seducer of man."
        },
        {
            "id": 27319,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "good",
                "men",
                "religion",
                "time"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/helen-keller/27319-it-is-wonderf-",
            "favorites_count": 0,
            "upvotes_count": 2,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Helen Keller",
            "author_permalink": "helen-keller",
            "body": "It is wonderful how much time good people spend fighting the devil. If they would only expend the same amount of energy loving their fellow men, the devil would die in his own tracks of ennui."
        },
        {
            "id": 43808,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "moving-on"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/nelson-mandela/43808-forget-the-pa-",
            "favorites_count": 3,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Nelson Mandela",
            "author_permalink": "nelson-mandela",
            "body": "Forget the past."
        },
        {
            "id": 34121,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "imagination"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/william-shakespeare/34121-the-lunatic-t-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "William Shakespeare",
            "author_permalink": "william-shakespeare",
            "body": "The lunatic, the lover, and the poet, are of imagination; all compact."
        },
        {
            "id": 57493,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "travel"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/gilbert-k-chesterton/57493-the-traveler--",
            "favorites_count": 3,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Gilbert K. Chesterton",
            "author_permalink": "gilbert-k-chesterton",
            "body": "The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see."
        },
        {
            "id": 26653,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "god",
                "religion"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/friedrich-nietzsche/26653-god-is-a-thou-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Friedrich Nietzsche",
            "author_permalink": "friedrich-nietzsche",
            "body": "God is a thought who makes crooked all that is straight."
        },
        {
            "id": 61967,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/humble/61967-winning-is-ha-",
            "favorites_count": 4,
            "upvotes_count": 2,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Humble",
            "author_permalink": "humble",
            "body": "Winning is half the battle.  Losing is the other half."
        },
        {
            "id": 68064,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/miss-nikole-stamm/68064-the-play-s-th-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 0,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Miss Nikole Stamm",
            "author_permalink": "miss-nikole-stamm",
            "body": "The play 's the thing wherein I'll catch the conscience of the king."
        },
        {
            "id": 55528,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "sympathy"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/william-shakespeare/55528-when-sorrows--",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 2,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "William Shakespeare",
            "author_permalink": "william-shakespeare",
            "body": "When sorrows come, they come not single spies, but in battalions."
        },
        {
            "id": 7284,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "best",
                "courage"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/george-w-bush/7284-great-tragedy--",
            "favorites_count": 4,
            "upvotes_count": 0,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "George W. Bush",
            "author_permalink": "george-w-bush",
            "body": "Great tragedy has come to us, and we are meeting it with the best that is in our country, with courage and concern for others because this is America. This is who we are."
        },
        {
            "id": 40355,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "men"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/johann-wolfgang-von-goethe/40355-to-the-person-",
            "favorites_count": 0,
            "upvotes_count": 2,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Johann Wolfgang von Goethe",
            "author_permalink": "johann-wolfgang-von-goethe",
            "body": "To the person with a firm purpose all men and things are servants."
        },
        {
            "id": 27312,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "good",
                "love"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/confucius/27312-it-is-easy-to-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 2,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Confucius",
            "author_permalink": "confucius",
            "body": "It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve and bad things are very easy to get."
        },
        {
            "id": 34111,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "imagination",
                "knowledge"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/albert-einstein/34111-imagination-i-",
            "favorites_count": 4,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Albert Einstein",
            "author_permalink": "albert-einstein",
            "body": "Imagination is more important than knowledge."
        },
        {
            "id": 38884,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "love"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/john-wooden/38884-passion-is-mo-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "John Wooden",
            "author_permalink": "john-wooden",
            "body": "Passion is momentary love is enduring."
        },
        {
            "id": 5033,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "art",
                "communication"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/gustave-flaubert/5033-the-art-of-wri-",
            "favorites_count": 3,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Gustave Flaubert",
            "author_permalink": "gustave-flaubert",
            "body": "The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe."
        },
        {
            "id": 828,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "age",
                "religion"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/mahatma-gandhi/828-every-formula-o-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 1,
            "author": "Mahatma Gandhi",
            "author_permalink": "mahatma-gandhi",
            "body": "Every formula of every religion has in this age of reason, to submit to the acid test of reason and universal assent."
        },
        {
            "id": 18211,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "failure"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/thomas-a-edison/18211-show-me-a-tho-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Thomas A. Edison",
            "author_permalink": "thomas-a-edison",
            "body": "Show me a thoroughly satisfied man and I will show you a failure."
        },
        {
            "id": 16003,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "education"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/marcus-aurelius/16003-natural-abili-",
            "favorites_count": 5,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Marcus Aurelius",
            "author_permalink": "marcus-aurelius",
            "body": "Natural ability without education has more often raised a man to glory and virtue than education without natural ability."
        },
        {
            "id": 272,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "imagination",
                "ideas",
                "american",
                "deaf",
                "blind"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/helen-keller/272-tyranny-cannot--",
            "favorites_count": 3,
            "upvotes_count": 3,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Helen Keller",
            "author_permalink": "helen-keller",
            "body": "Tyranny cannot defeat the power of ideas."
        },
        {
            "id": 18964,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "faith",
                "good",
                "technology"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/steve-jobs/18964-technology-is-",
            "favorites_count": 4,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Steve Jobs",
            "author_permalink": "steve-jobs",
            "body": "Technology is nothing. What's important is that you have a faith in people, that they're basically good and smart, and if you give them tools, they'll do wonderful things with them."
        },
        {
            "id": 13616,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "death"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/albert-einstein/13616-intellectual--",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 1,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Albert Einstein",
            "author_permalink": "albert-einstein",
            "body": "Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death."
        },
        {
            "id": 62045,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/abdu-l-baha/62045-aim-high-choo-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 0,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Abdu'l-Baha",
            "author_permalink": "abdu-l-baha",
            "body": "Aim high, choose noble ends..."
        },
        {
            "id": 28072,
            "dialogue": false,
            "private": false,
            "tags": [
                "government"
            ],
            "url": "https://favqs.com/quotes/henry-ward-beecher/28072-the-worst-thi-",
            "favorites_count": 2,
            "upvotes_count": 3,
            "downvotes_count": 0,
            "author": "Henry Ward Beecher",
            "author_permalink": "henry-ward-beecher",
            "body": "The worst thing in this world, next to anarchy, is government."
        }
    ]
}

    "author": "Anonymous",
    "author_permalink": "anonymous",
    "body": "Make everything as simple as possible, but not simpler.",
    "user_details": {
        "favorite": true,
        "upvote": false,
        "downvote": false,
        "hidden": false
    }
}

pm.expect(jsonData.body).to.eql("All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.");
